name: currentDate
description: Current date which acts as the pre-filled date.

name: isClearable
description: Determines if the date picker is clearable.

name: minDate
description: Minimum date that can be selected. Dates before this date will be disabled.

name: isDark
description:
Dark theme for the date picker.
Dark theme is only available for Chromium-like browsers and Safari, Firefox is not supported.
